snippet: An analysis of the last 10 seasons shows that field-goal percentage defense and assist-to-turnover ratio are most correlated with teams winning the Colonial Athletic Association tournament.
abstract: An analysis of the last 10 seasons shows that field-goal percentage defense and assist-to-turnover ratio are most correlated with teams winning the Colonial Athletic Association tournament.
lead_paragraph: Field-goal percentage defense, assist-to-turnover ratio and rebounding margin:  a recent analysis on The Quad found that success in those three statistical categories to be most correlated with men's college basketball teams reaching the Final Four. But are they also the best predictors for other levels of basketball success?

headline.main: Statistics That Drive Success in the Colonial
